author: h0lidayplans
title: Pullman Paris was a really good experience
text:
The room was really clean, the breakfast was perfect and it had 3 differenct sections for it. The staff service was really good as well.
It is really centrally located with everything around it such as supermarkets, coffee shops, restaurants, pharmacies, train stations and shopping centre as well
Room Tip: Choose a high level room for great view See more room tips
